name: Acept it
description:
Warning, This game features periods and menstruations, if you don't want to see this then don't play the game

Lucy Dazzled, a young lizard girl, she is in that special age in wich she must go to "the academy".

This is supposed to be the best time of her life, new friends and experiences, learning new things... fighting new things.

Lucy had her first period a lot of time ago but she still hasn't got completely used to it, she will have to start to regulate the use of pads and more.

This DEMO is just a short example of what the game could be in the future, many features are yet to come.

This is game is also related to "The High" another game by me.

If there are any bugs or ideas for the future of the game comment down below, thanks nwn
